summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5735 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Alta Vista Addition, being the alley between 44th Avenue Southwest and 45th Avenue Southwest, from West Genesee Street to West Dakota Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75739, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
